revision.comment: removed advantages and drawback section since there's no alternative anymore
revision.text:
{{DISPLAYTITLE:foo_DUMB}}{{stub}} '''foo_DUMB''' is originally a plugin for {{wp|foobar2000}} to let it use [https://github.com/kode54/dumb a significantly modified version of] the [http://dumb.sourceforge.net/ Dynamic Universal Music Bibliotheque]. A customized version of this plugin (based on foo_DUMB v0.9.8.4) is used in [[ZDoom]] to provide a [[module replayer]].
==External links== * [http://www.foobar2000.org/components/view/foo_dumb Official foo_DUMB plugin] [[Category:Audio systems]]
